summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4081 for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 45 and 46, Law's 2nd Addition, being the alley between Queen Anne Avenue and 1st Avenue West from West Galer Street to West Garfield Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49082, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
